Description:
Detects executable access via webdav6. Can be seen in APT 29 such as from the emulated APT 29 hackathon https://github.com/OTRF/detection-hackathon-apt29/

Author: SOC Prime, Adam Swan
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Executable from Webdav
Query: sourcetype='zeek-http' eql select * from _source_ where ((c-useragent like '%webdav%' and c-uri like '%webdav%') and (resp_mime_types like '%dosexec%' and c-uri like '%.exe'))
